data.eml:eml: A new species of Xylota Meigen (Diptera: Syrphidae) from the Far East

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mutin, Valerii, Ichige, Katsuyoshi (2014): A new species of Xylota Meigen (Diptera: Syrphidae) from the Far East. Zootaxa 3878 (2): 196-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3878.2.6
